Translations.Text: A yimdanen! Ippunefk ed umedya, selt as d: ih, wid u$uo tepnujum, war Oebbi, ur zmiren, d awez$i, a d xelqen izi, xas mlalen $ef waya. Ma illa wayen i sen iuker yizi, ur zmiren ad as t id kksen. D uohif umsuter, d uohif win issuter
Ur qudoen ara Oebbi, azal n lqedo iS. Ih, Oebbi d Uohid, d Uzmir
Oebbi Iferren imazanen ger lmalayek, u ger imdanen. Ih, Oebbi Issel, Ipwali
Issen i illan zdat sen, i illan deffir sen. Ar Oebbi ad u$alen lumuo
A wid iumnen! Iiinzet u knut, aabdet Mass nnwen, xedmet lxio, amar a prebeem

Jahdet ar Oebbi leeqq ujahed iS. Neppa Ifren ikwen. Ur kwen Ihejjen ara di ddin, ddin ubabat wen Iboahim. Neppa, i wen isemman, zik, imvuaen. Deg waya, ad yili Umazan d anagi nnwen, u a ppilim d inagan n medden. Ihi, eeallet, zekkit, teiifem di Oebbi. Neppa d Bab nnwen. D Bab amxallef, d Asellak amxallef
